name: Hunt of the Pumpkin
description:
You are the pumpkin... Good luck trying to survive, because the chef is after you.

Project was made in 4 days for Finnish College Jam #3.

Controls

Spacebar to jump.

Left-click for buttons.

 

Finnish College Jam #3 Diversifiers: 

Minimalist, Can't Stop Moving, Two Button Controls and Pausing Has Consequences.

 

Programmer:  Noel Söyrinki.

Artists: Elias, Hamed and Jimi.
